material: coated metal (appears to be neoprene or vinyl)
key_features: Dumbbell hand weights for exercise and resistance training
Ideal for fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
ai_description: A set of two pink dumbbells with hexagonal ends, featuring a smooth matte finish. Each dumbbell has the brand 'KAKSS' and the weight '1.5 KG' printed in white lettering on the ends. The dumbbells are shown individually and in use during home workouts, appearing alongside other fitness equipment like resistance bands and yoga mats. The product has a clean, modern aesthetic with bright pink coloring.
target_audience: people interested in fitness classes, home gyms, or workout areas
